item.title: 部落冲突游戏策略
item.description: 这篇文章总结了一些部落冲突游戏里常用的技巧。 资源 实验室 实验室正在研发科技的时候是可以升级实验室的，科技研发速度会减半。 部落城堡 从部落城堡、月

item.title: 2023年高考全国甲卷理科数学
item.description: 本文简略探讨一下 2023 年高考全国甲卷理科数学的部分试题。

item.title: Android WiFi Issue Due to IPv6 DNS
item.description: This article documents my trobleshooting experience to fix a WiFi issue on my Android phone.

item.title: Build Chef For Raspberry Pi
item.description: Chef is a configuration management software that can automate many DevOps tasks. It supports a variety of platforms. However, it does not have official support for ARM based platforms, such as Raspberry Pi. This article describes how to compile Chef from source on a Raspberry Pi.

item.title: Extract APKs from Android System using ADB
item.description: Sometimes developers needs to extract APK files from an Android phone, for the purpose of malware analysis, etc. This article describes how to do that with the ADB tool.

item.title: Fourier Analysis Notes - Chapter 2 - 1
item.description: My notes when reading Fourier Analysis An Introduction by Stein and Shakarchi. This is for chapter 2 Basic Properties of Fourier Series, section 1 Examples and formulation of the problem.

item.title: Fourier Analysis Notes - Chapter 2 - 2
item.description: My notes when reading Fourier Analysis An Introduction by Stein and Shakarchi. This is for chapter 2 Basic Properties of Fourier Series, section 2 Uniqueness of Fourier series.

item.description: My notes when reading Fourier Analysis An Introduction by Stein and Shakarchi. This is for chapter 2 Basic Properties of Fourier Series, section 3 Convolutions.

item.title: LeetCode 2202 Maximize the Topmost Element After K Moves
item.description: This is an interesting question. Upon first look, it seems to be a stack-related question, as the operation of moving stuff from a pile resembles a stack data structure. However, it actually has nothing to do with stacks.

item.title: LeetCode 2644 Find the Maximum Divisibility Score
item.description: This problem has a pretty straightforward solution. Don’t over-think about math tricks like multiplying all the numbers, etc. The most intuitive solution just works.

item.title: LeetCode Good Explanation List
item.description: This post contains a list of good explanations of LeetCode questions found in various places.

item.title: Simple Video Editing with FFmpeg
item.description:
Professional video editing is usually done in Adobe Premiere or Final Cut Pro. However, for simple video editing tasks, such as cutting one segment out of a long video, or cropping the frame to a smaller size, etc., it is not necessary to use these bulky software, let alone they are quite expensive. Fortunately, ffmpeg is a free but powerful tool to solve these video editing tasks.

This article serves as a cookbook for frequently used video editing tasks using ffmpeg. It will be updated as new recipes emerges.

item.title: Turn off screen in Linux using command line
item.description: This article explains how to turn off screen in Linux using command line.

item.title: Useful Linux Command - tee
item.description: This article introduces a useful Linux command tee.

item.title: Useful Linux Tips
item.description: This article contains various Linux tips. I will add more content from time to time. If this article grows too large, I may split it into several different articles with some categorization.
